entry.title: Book review - Accelerate by Nibole Forsgren, Jez Humble and Gene Kim
entry.summary: Lean methodologies, DevOps, small cycles, CI/CD, no overtime, freedom, quality, culture, sustainable workâ€¦ cool stuff. A lot of people talk about them in positive terms but Nicole Forsgrem, Jez Humble and Gene Kim decided to go one step further: demonstrate that these things work.
